text: Kevin Paul Hollinrake (born 28 September 1963) is a British Conservative Party politician and businessman. He has been the Shadow Secretary of State for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities since 2024. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Thirsk and Malton since May 2015. He was the Minister of State for Enterprise, Markets and Small Business from 2022 to 2024. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:UK MPs 2024–present Category:English businesspeople Category:People from North Yorkshire
title: Kevin Hollinrake
